biotools.summary: A versatile tool that assists quantitative and qualitative analysis of fluorescence recovery after photobleaching data. The user can handle simultaneously large data sets of raw data, visualize fluorescence recovery curves, exclude low quality data, perform data normalization, extract quantitative parameters, perform batch analysis and save the resulting data and figures for further use.

bioschemas.name: easyFRAP
